name: BRIXX (Tera Image Interactive)
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN BETA !

It's a Simple Slide Scroller Game, which introduces a simple square character called Redd, who likes going through different places collecting food, because, well, he likes walking.

As the levels continue to be developed, the challenges will get more and more interesting and more involving!

WATCH THIS SPACE!

PS. YOUR'E DONATIONS ARE HIGHLY APPRECIATED! WE ARE A RAGTAG GROUP WITH BIG DREAM> TO MAKE VERY LEGIT GAMES YA'LL WILL LOVE, AND YOU'RE DONATIONS WILL MAKE THAT HAPPEN.
